snippet: The Baylor star's versatility is his strength. He's capable of strong production as a flanker, split, end, slot receiver and even a return specialist. This makes him a great fit for any N.F.L. system.
abstract: The Baylor star's versatility is his strength. He's capable of strong production as a flanker, split, end, slot receiver and even a return specialist. This makes him a great fit for any N.F.L. system.

headline.main: Kendall Wright, Third-Ranked Receiver in 2012 Draft
